scenario: Create Project API Validation - Comprehensive Test Suite

testCases.name: Null userId
testCases.expectedResult: 400 Bad Request - userId cannot be null

testCases.name: Empty userId
testCases.expectedResult: 400 Bad Request - userId cannot be empty

testCases.name: Invalid userId - Non-numeric
testCases.expectedResult: 400 Bad Request - userId must be numeric

testCases.name: ProjectName - Exceeds max length
testCases.expectedResult: 400 Bad Request - Project name too long

testCases.name: Null projectDescription
testCases.expectedResult: 200 OK - Optional field can be null

testCases.name: Invalid autonomous value - Out of range
Invalid token
testCases.note: Send request with invalid Bearer token

testCases.name: Null optional fields - All nulls
testCases.expectedResult: 200 OK - Optional fields can be null
